title: Happy Birthday, Hanamaru!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Happy birthday, Hanamaru!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thank you, Umi-san! Ehehe, when someone congratulates me, Maru get this tingling sensation zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I have a present for you. It’s this....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>This size, this weight.... A book!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Fufu, I heard that you like books, Hanamaru. This book is a poetry anthology.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>A poetry anthology.... Can Maru open it zura?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Of course. I hope you find it to your liking, Hanamaru....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Uwaaa, the cover is so beautiful zura.... These poems are so straightforward and refreshing, reading them makes me feel like Maru is floating in the blue sky....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I’m glad you like it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>This poetry anthology is just like you zura, Umi-san. I’ll read it carefully! Thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
